meta.description:
- GP02611

Dr. Shamim Ahmed checks stored vaccines in the Primary Health Centre, Tangtse village, Durbuk block, Ladakh. The clinic draws electricity from the solar photovoltaic plant in Tangtse, which has enabled it to store its own vaccines at sub-zero temperatures, amongst other applications. “We are on the verge of eradicating polio here,” says Dr. Ahmed.
